comment.author: 46621729@N08
comment._content:
Bailiolman and anyone else who knew Jacob Rosenstein or knows something about him.  I am his nephew and am trying to piece together some details regarding his last actions before being killed. 

We believe he was indeed a hero based on some information we have uncovered, and seeing you write the word in the comment field, obviously makes us very curious if you also have information.

Hope you will respond to my query.
